page.title: 05A Day in the Life...
page.content: Nearly every Saturday morning I wake up at 9.30am. I stagger downstairs and put on the television. Cartoon Time is on ITV at 9.30am. The cartoon is usually about Donald Duck or Tweetie Pie. I then get my cornflakes and a drink of chocolate. After watching Cartoon Time I go upstairs and choose what to wear. I then go downstairs,feed my cat and take my dog for a walk. When I return I phone my friend Emma. We either go shopping in Croydon or to the cinema. We usually get home at 3pm. Emma either comes to my house or I go to hers. If I stay the night at her house we usually sing songs and play her piano. Emma has a Commodore 64 computer which we sometimes play games on. We have dinner at 6.30pm. Then we watch videos and go to bed at 11.30pm. If we have any food and sweets we have a midnight feast.
